title: ISic000480. I.Sicily inscription 000480
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]
1VALERIUSMAXUMUS
[---]

Apparatus criticus

text of Maggiore

Italian translation

Valerio Massimo

English translation

Valerius Maximus

commentary

CIL merely reports the fleeting report of Niccolo Maggiore that the text including the words Valerius Maxumus was found in Corleone in the 18th century (and notes a second referencing a Pompeius)

bibliography

  • Maggiore 1825 94 n.20 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002466
  • 10.7199 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
